      • update

        static void update()
        Used for save changes to local text file. Should be called immediately after the account been changed.

      • register

        public static int register(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String address,
                           java.lang.String DOB,
                           int type,
                           double amount)
        Register a new account, and feedback register result. If success, this new account will be the active account.
        Parameters:
        name - name of customer
        address - address of customer
        DOB - Date of birth
        type - account type
        Returns:
        0 -register success / 1 -incorrect format of date / 2 -insufficient credit figure / 3 -is not a junior / 4 -has a poor credit history

      • logIn

        public static boolean logIn(long accNo,
                            int PIN)
        Log in, and active account is loaded meanwhile. Most operations need to log in first.
        Parameters:
        accNo - Account number
        PIN - Personal identification number
        Returns:
        true/false success or fail

      • setPIN

        public static void setPIN(int PIN)
        Set PIN for new account.
        Parameters:
        PIN - Personal identification number

      • getBalance

        public static double getBalance()
        Access active account balance.
        Returns:
        balance(double)

      • isSuspended

        public static boolean isSuspended()
        Check if active account is suspended.
        Returns:
        true/false suspended or not suspended

      • deposit

        public static void deposit(double amount,
                           boolean cleared)
        Deposit
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to deposit
        cleared - if need to be cleared

      • withdraw

        public static int withdraw(double amount)
        Withdraw, and feedback withdraw result.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to deposit
        Returns:
        WITHDRAW_SUCCESS = 0 / EXCEED_OVERDRAFT_LIMIT = 1 / WITHDRAWAL_IS_NOT_ALLOWED = 2 / HAS_NOT_NOTICED = 3

      • logOut

        static void logOut()
        Log out active account.
        See Also:
        logIn(long, int)

        public static void suspend()
        Suspend active account.
        See Also:

      • reinstate

        public static void reinstate()
        Reinstate active account.
        See Also:
        logIn(long, int)

      • closeAccount

        public static void closeAccount()
        Close active account. All information about this account is eliminated in local text file.

      • applyNotice

        public static boolean applyNotice(int noticeDays)
        Apply a notice, only being called when active account is a saver account.
        Parameters:
        noticeDays - how many days later which active account apply a notice
        Returns:
        true/false success or fail

      • getNoticeDate

        public static java.lang.String getNoticeDate()
        Access the day active account can withdraw. Only Being called when active is a saver account.
        Returns:
        "yyyy-MM-dd"

      • findAccountByNo

        public static BankAccount findAccountByNo(long accNo)
        Find account by account number, and load to active account.
        Parameters:
        accNo - account number
        Returns:
        BankAccount

      • canClose

        public static boolean canClose()
        Check if active account balance is cleared to zero. Be called to check if the account can be closed.
        Returns:
        true/false can or can not
